casebody.data:
No. 132,

Original.

State of Alabama, et al., Plaintiffs v. State North Carolina. 562 U.S. 820, 131 S. Ct. 378,

178 L. Ed. 2d 14,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6157. October 4, 2010.

Motion of the Special Master for allowance of fees and reimbursement of expenses granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $80,904.16 for the period November 1, 2006, through June 30, 2010, to be paid equally by the parties.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
